cotterpin

Interface ComponentStrategy<P,T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Function<Function<P,T>,Function<P,T>>, UnaryOperator<Function<P,T>>
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface ComponentStrategy<P,T>
extends UnaryOperator<Function<P,T>>
    Strategy interface for retrieving "component" objects. These are considered as those that might already exist on the parent, as well as Collections and Maps.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Default Methods
